metadata.title: C++ Serbia Community
metadata.description: Join the vibrant community of C++ developers in Serbia. Discover events, meetups, workshops, and connect with fellow C++ enthusiasts.
metadata.ogDescription: Join the vibrant community of C++ developers in Serbia. Discover events, meetups, workshops, and connect with fellow C++ enthusiasts.

hero.title: C++ Serbia Community
hero.subtitle: Join our vibrant community of C++ developers in Serbia. Share knowledge, participate in events, and grow your skills with fellow enthusiasts.

about.title: About Our Community
about.paragraph1: C++ Serbia is a community dedicated to promoting C++ programming language and best practices. We bring together developers of all skill levels, from beginners to experts.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to create a supportive environment where members can learn, share knowledge, and network with other C++ enthusiasts.
about.paragraph3: Whether you're looking to improve your skills, find mentorship, or simply connect with like-minded developers, C++ Serbia is the place for you.

featuredEvents.title: Featured Events
featuredEvents.subtitle: Join us at our next meetups and workshops
featuredEvents.empty: No featured events at the moment. Check back soon!

joinSection.title: Join Our Community
joinSection.subtitle: Connect with us on these platforms
joinSection.learnDescription: Access workshops, talks, and resources to enhance your C++ skills
joinSection.networkDescription: Connect with other developers, mentors, and potential employers
joinSection.contributeDescription: Share your knowledge and help build a stronger C++ community

eventsPage.title: Events - C++ Serbia Community
eventsPage.description: Join C++ Serbia community events! Discover upcoming meetups, workshops, and conferences for C++ developers in Serbia.
eventsPage.heading: Events
eventsPage.subtitle: Stay up to date with all C++ Serbia community events, meetups, workshops, and conferences.
eventsPage.emptyUpcoming: No upcoming events scheduled yet! Just in case, save the date for the last Wednesday of the month.
eventsPage.subscribeFeed: Subscribe to our feeds to get updates on our future events
